title: (x) Letter Gothic and Lotta Jansdotter word mark - Courier {Tiff}
content:
any ideas on the attached word mark? also any other typefaces that might be similar to letter gothic that people could recomend? i love letter gothic... is that bad?  
thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108192426im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_5453.gif)
author: Moore

comments.content: That looks more like Courier to me.

Nothing wrong with loving LG. It's a lovely, warmer alternative to Courier. There are many cuts of [Letter Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108192426/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&searchstr=Letter%20Gothic), and most differ slightly.

Alternatives to LG:  
 [ITC Officina](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108192426/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&searchstr=Officina)  
 [FF Typestar](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108192426/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=FF.11054.0.0)  
 [FF Nexus Typewriter](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108192426/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&searchstr=Nexus%20Typewriter)  
 [URW Typewriter](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108192426/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&searchstr=URW%20Typewriter)
